gitIntegration.description: Defines how Pinokio AutoGPT integrates with Git for version control and tracking evolution.

commitChanges.description: Commits changes to the repository after a learning, decision-making, or self-modification process.

pushChanges.description: Pushes committed changes to the remote repository for backup and collaboration purposes.

pullChanges.description: Pulls changes from the remote repository to ensure the local version is up-to-date.

branchManagement.description: Creates, merges, and deletes branches for testing and implementing new features or modifications.

versionLogging.description: Logs all Git activities for tracking and auditing purposes.

activityLogging.description: Logs all Git activities in real-time.

auditLogging.description: Logs all Git activities in a format suitable for auditing.

errorHandling.description: Handles any errors or exceptions that occur during Git operations.

exceptionCatching.description: Catches and logs exceptions that occur during Git operations.

errorResolution.description: Attempts to resolve errors or exceptions and return to normal operation.
